annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink, I’m looking at the making a Tom Collins. In this video, I’ll show you one way to make a Tom Collins, and then walk you throu...
annotations.title: Tom Collins | How to Drink

textContent:
2oz Old Tom Gin
1oz Lemon juice
.25oz Simple syrup

Shake and pour
Top with Seltzer

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bK_kBsqqA0I
title: Tom Collins
